Class FeedbackReviewsControls

java.lang.Object
com.Software.FitnessSystem.ClientControllers.FeedbackReviewsControls
public class FeedbackReviewsControls extends Object
The FeedbackReviewsControls class handles user feedback including ratings and reviews and suggestions for the fitness programs.
Author:
Alaa Alawneh

  • Constructor Details

    • FeedbackReviewsControls

      public FeedbackReviewsControls()
      Default constructor for AccountManagementControls because the class uses static methods no need to make an instance

  • Method Details

    • submitRating

      public static String submitRating(String username, String programId, int rating)
      Submits a rating for a specified fitness program
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user submitting the rating
      programId - the ID of the program being rated
      rating - the client rating and must be between 1 and 5
      Returns:
      a confirmation message indicating the status of the submission

    • submitReview

      public static String submitReview(String username, String programId, String review)
      Submits a review for a fitness program
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user submitting the review
      programId - the ID of the program being reviewed
      review - the review text
      Returns:
      a confirmation message indicating the status of the submission

    • submitSuggestion

      public static String submitSuggestion(String username, String programId, String suggestion)
      Submits a suggestion for a fitness program
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the user submitting the suggestion
      programId - the ID of the program for which the suggestion is being made
      suggestion - the suggestion text
      Returns:
      a confirmation message indicating the status of the submission
